com.androidanimator.demo

Class AnimationListActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.androidanimator.demo.AnimationListActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnimationListFragment.Callbacks

    public class AnimationListActivity
extends Activity
implements AnimationListFragment.Callbacks
    An activity representing a list of Animations. This activity has different presentations for phones and tablets. On phones, the activity presents a list of items, which when touched, lead to a AnimationDetailActivity representing item details. On tablets, the activity presents the list of items and item details side-by-side using two vertical panes.

    The activity makes heavy use of fragments. The list of items is AnimationListFragment and the item details (if present) is AnimationDetailFragment.

    This activity also implements the required AnimationListFragment.Callbacks interface to listen for item selections.
